gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 102, Heat 97
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Heat, 102-97. DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Bulls with 23 points, four rebounds, and four assists, while Nikola Vucevic added 15 points and eight rebounds in the victory. Jimmy Butler tallied 25 points, three rebounds, and two assists for the Heat in the losing effort. The Bulls improve to 5-9 on the season, while the Heat fall to 8-5.
